metadata.title: CVE-2016-8686 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The bm_new function in bitmap.h in potrace 1.13 allows remote attackers tohave unspecified impact via a crafted image, which triggers a memoryallocation failure.

criterions.comment: potrace: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
